applyTo: '**'

# Repository Instructions

- Use conventional commits for commit messages.
- Always push in a branch related to the issue you are working on.
- Each branch name should start with "feat/", "fix/", "chore/", or "docs/" depending on the type of work being done, followed by the issue number and a brief description (e.g., feat/PRO-123-add-login-feature).
- Always ask for the issue number before starting the work.
